Reviews/Synopsis
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please go to the following website(s) for detailed information:
 <a href="
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghost_in_the_Shell_%28film%29" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghost_in_the_Shell_%28film%29</a>

The skillful blending of drawn animation and computer-generated imagery excited anime fans when this science fiction mystery was released in 1995: many enthusiasts believe Ghost suggests what the future of anime will be, at least in the short term.
 The film is set in the not-too-distant future, when an unnamed government uses lifelike cyborgs or "enhanced" humans for undercover work. One of the key cyborgs is The Major, Motoko Kusanagi, who resembles a cross between The Terminator and a Playboy centerfold.
 She finds herself caught up in a tangled web of espionage and counterespionage as she searches for the mysterious superhacker known as "The Puppet Master."
